mapper.select: select * from ( select pl_no, vendor_no, pt_no, product_name, null as delivery, inprice, outprice, spec, tol, reg_date, case pt_no when 1 then '원재료' when 3 then '완제품' end as pt_type from product_list union all select rm_no, account_no, pt_no, rm_name, delivery, inprice, outprice, spec, tol, reg_date, case pt_no when 1 then '원재료' when 3 then '완제품' end from raw_material ) order by pt_no desc, pl_no asc
select * from raw_material order by rm_no
mapper.insert: insert into bom values( seq_bom.nextval, #{productCode}, default )
mapper.select: select bom_no from bom where pl_no = #{productCode}
